channel.title: New Paintings: Plots, Grids, Models
channel.description: Plots, grids, models explores the feedback loops, histories, and efficacy of models used to control the built environment and its component networks of built and natural systems. This series explores how the ‘model,’ like a painting, can be a means of abstraction and artistic expression; with the artist as modeler and the painting as model.

item.title: Initial Conditions — Emerson Center for the Arts
item.description: Initial Conditions consists of two conceptually similar, but materially different, series of work. Brought together to show for the first time, these paintings and a sculptural installation speculate on the future infrastructure of the built environment and explore the human (in)ability to model and control complex natural systems.
